snippet: The deaths of three students this semester at George Washington University underscore the difficulties colleges face in recognizing and addressing mental health issues.
abstract: Deaths of three students at George Washington University underscore the difficulties colleges face in recognizing and addressing mental health issues; first death has been confirmed a suicide, while causes of the other two are still unknown.
lead_paragraph: The deaths of three students this semester at George Washington University underscore the difficulties colleges face in recognizing and addressing mental health issues.

headline.seo: Trio of George Washington Student Deaths Rattle University
headline.main: Student Deaths, One After the Other, Unsettle a Close-Knit Campus
headline.print_headline: Student Deaths, One After the Other, Unsettle a Close-Knit Campus
